articles.title: Xi Hammers Home His Message of Control Over Tibet in Rare Visit - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping called for his government to tighten its ethnic-assimilation campaign during a rare visit to Tibet, throwing a spotlight on a region that’s also been a source of tension with India even as the rivals improve ties.
